commentary: All this talk about insidious malefactors whispering in Vriska's ear and warping her thoughts, and Word of God admissions that this is exactly what's happening to her from multiple fronts at once, should help stoke the fires of Vriskourse and give a lot more ammunition to her apologists, who like to point out that nothing Vriska  does is ever really quite her fault. There's a word for these people: heroes. They are absolutely right, and if you take one lesson from these notes, let it be this. Vriska has done nothing wrong. Not even once in her life, and she never will.
